item.description:
This is Sheetmulch mob #2... we had so much fun in Sopo that we are going to suppress some lawn and build some soil and community, but this time we are in Yarmouth !!

We will be sheetmulching two raised beds... learn the about the ingredients, the process, and do's & don'ts.

All skill levels welcome, but this is a hands on introduction to sheetmulching.

Bring gloves and be prepared to get some dirt on yourself ;)

*Clean leaves and seaweed would be great if you have some to spare

Cost $5

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Sheetmulch Mob II ... building soil in raised beds!
